DOCNAME: CASE OF ILONA KOVÁCS v. HUNGARY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Administrative proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time);Violation of Article 13 - Right to an effective remedy (Article 13 - Effective remedy)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought an action against the GPE ORG challenging an administrative decision whereby the registration document of her car had been revoked .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG adopted a final judgment quashing the administrative decision in question .
CARDINAL . It appears that the ensuing administrative proceedings to have the registration document reissued have been pending ever since .
